Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

Nenjinal varai aval porinthathu, aasaiyil mazhai athil nanainthathu� 
Nooru jenmanghal ninaivinil irrukum, athu pol entha naal varai � 
Uyir urughiye antha naal sugham, athai ninaikayil 
Raththa naadighal rathiri vedikum� 
Oru nimisham kuude ennai piriyavillai, vivaram yethum aval ariyavillai� 
Ennai irunthu pothum aval ennathillaye, marunthupo en maname� 
La la la la la la....leh�. 
Unnai endradda naan marupenne naan marupenne� 
Unnalle nenjil pootha kaadhal melum melum thunbam thunbam vendam� 

(Venmathi)
